content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going well! Just got back from work. How's yours?
It's going good! I just got back from a walk. Where do you work?
I work at an animal clinic. What about you?
I'm a stay at home mom. What do you like to do for fun?
I love listening to music while I eat my lunch. What about you?
I love listening to music too! I also love learning about my father's culture and heritage.
That's so interesting! What culture is your father from?
He's from India. I love learning about the history and traditions of his country.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to visit India.
You should! It's a beautiful country with so much to offer.
Maybe I will one day! What's your favorite thing about being a stay at home mom?
I love getting to spend all day with my kids. I also love being able to make my own schedule.
That sounds amazing! I love kids but I don't know if I'd be able to handle being a stay at home mom.
It's definitely not for everyone but I love it.
I'm sure you're great at it
